clusters.title: Sales Milestones
clusters.description: Entrepreneurs are achieving significant sales milestones through TikTok's livestream platform. Stormi Steele of Canvas Beauty set a record by surpassing $2 million in sales during a single livestream. Additionally, she made over $1 million in just two hours during a Black Friday event. Similarly, Mandy Peña of SimplyMandys achieved over $1.2 million in sales in one TikTok LIVE session, highlighting the platform's potential for substantial revenue generation.

clusters.title: Music Impact
clusters.description: TikTok's influence on global music trends is evident as the platform's top songs inspire billions of streams and millions of video creations. The global Top Song of 2024, 'Gata Only,' alone generated 1.3 billion Spotify streams and over 50 million TikTok creations. Additionally, TikTok trends significantly impacted the Billboard Hot 100, with 13 of the 16 No. 1 songs in 2024 having major trends on the platform. K-Pop artists and Latin tracks also feature prominently in TikTok's global music landscape.
